<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Base class containing the logic for constructing DWARF expressions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// independently of whether they are emitted into a DIE or into a .debug&#95;loc</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">/// entry.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Some DWARF operations, e.g. DW&#95;OP&#95;entry&#95;value, need to calculate the size</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of a succeeding DWARF block before the latter is emitted to the output.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// To handle such cases, data can conditionally be emitted to a temporary</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// buffer, which can later on be committed to the main output. The size of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// temporary buffer is queryable, allowing for the size of the data to be</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">/// emitted before the data is committed.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\param MaxSize              If the register must be composed from</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                             sub-registers this is an upper bound</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                             for how many bits the emitted DW&#95;OP&#95;piece</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///                             may cover.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// If size and offset is zero an operation for the entire register is</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// emitted: Some targets do not provide a DWARF register number for every</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// register.  If this is the case, this function will attempt to emit a DWARF</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// register by emitting a fragment of a super-register or by piecing together</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// multiple subregisters that alias the register.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\return false if no DWARF register exists for MachineReg.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfexpression-2/#a57484713254f31f8412d08ff85259761">addMachineReg</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetregisterinfo">TargetRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinesink-cpp/#a0f36ed1bc17fc1aa97fe291c439a0698">TRI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">llvm::Register</a> MachineReg,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">                     </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MaxSize = ~1U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Emit a DW&#95;OP&#95;stack&#95;value, if supported.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The proper way to describe a constant value is DW&#95;OP&#95;constu &lt;const&gt;,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// DW&#95;OP&#95;stack&#95;value.  Unfortunately, DW&#95;OP&#95;stack&#95;value was not available</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// until DWARF 4, so we will continue to generate DW&#95;OP&#95;constu &lt;const&gt; for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// DWARF 2 and DWARF 3 Technically, this is incorrect since DW&#95;OP&#95;const</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// &lt;const&gt; actually describes a value at a constant address, not a constant</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// value.  However, in the past there was no better way to describe a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// constant value, so the producers and consumers started to rely on</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// heuristics to disambiguate the value vs. location status of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// expression.  See PR21176 for more details.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfexpression-2/#a93f0796a16275cd71f21761c339cd19f">addStackValue</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
